quote: The trouble with most of us is that we'd rather be ruined by praise than saved by criticism. – Norman Vincent Peale
fact: A dime has 118 ridges around the edge. A quarter has 119.
joke: It doesn't matter how much you push the envelope. It will still be stationary.
